song.title: Hauting Apparition
song.info:
(c) basehead / fm 1997
all samples by me, except for a radix percloop samples from: beastie boys, domina (calr craig), fiuczynski/medeski, bt, the fixx, korg ms20, roland r8 bass samples played by fima ephron, from his composition 'fima's sunrise', c/o the fuze/j.m. recording. composed for restless issue #1 a new diskmag made in OUR hemisphere =)
